about_the_game:
In this demo you'll be able to enjoy some basic combat with one of the weapons, as well as get to see some of the random dialogue generation mechanics and VHS-style interface from the 80s! After all, the game's history takes place in the 80s.
Inspired by Dead Space!

If you like zombie games, tense and mysterious you will love this title!

Add the game to your wish list!
Share and recommend to your friends after all it's free! (the demo)

Demo made in Game Maker Studio 2! Same software where similar games: Undertale, Katana Zero and Hotline Miami were made!

About the story:
Corvo is a watchman who works in the Federal District. One day he met an unusual scientist while investigating one of the gangs in one of the District's slums. A few years pass and a guinea pig escapes from this scientist's laboratory. Amidst the chaos, the vigilante has a new nickname: the parasite killer!

About combat:
Use Shift to Run; Use the W,A,S and D keys to change the character's direction; Press the R key to reload the weapon; Press the left mouse click to shoot; Press the space bar to dodge and press the E key to Interact with some of the elements of the scenario.

Finally: be careful not to get bloody!

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence.
Murder.
Monsters and creatures.
Scary images and music.

name: Parasite Slayer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 to Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Play this amazing demo for as long as you like! That's right! In this demo of the game Parasite Slayer you'll be able to enjoy basic combat against a horde of enemies to the sound of one of the songs that are part of the game's original soundtrack! Final release scheduled for March 25, 2022!
